data.name: Orcs Must Die! 3 - Cold as Eyes DLC
data.detailed_description:
In Cold as Eyes, Warmages must now battle against the mighty Cyclopeans across three new maps! To help hold off the hordes, Cold As Eyes also adds new tools for Warmages including the Molten Gold Trap, Cyclopean Gaze Trinket, and a Flamethrower.

The Cold As Eyes DLC includes:

3 New Scenarios in Icy Environments - Maps available in Campaign, Endless, and Scramble Modes

New Race: Cyclopean - Upon death, heals all nearby Cyclopean units

New Enemy: Cyclopean Shaman - Creates totems that disable War Mage traps

New Enemy: Cyclopean Mesmerizer - Tracks Warmages with a powerful arcane ray

New Enemies: Cyclopean Medium & Heavy - Bolster the Cyclopean army

New Weapon: Flamethrower - Burns enemies with a powerful secondary breath attack

New Trinket: Cyclopean Gaze - Turns Warmages and their enemies into stone

New Trap: Molten Gold - Coats enemies in gold, with a chance to drop a special coin

New Buffs & Debuffs - Variety of new additions to Scramble Mode

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic, Czech, Danish, Finnish, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian*, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K | AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060, 3 GB | AMD Radeon RX Vega 64
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
